text: The women's 60 metres hurdles event at the 1979 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held on 24 February in Vienna.ResultsResults (p. 477) ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Danuta Perka '''' |Grażyna Rabsztyn '''' |Nina Morgulina '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 3 from each heat (Q) and the next 6 fastest (q) qualified for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
